Articles.Content:
After the burn start Im waiting a bit for engines full thrust, then release launch stability enhacers and side boosters starts wobbling back and forth (from the picture;s perspective)

 

There's also a bunch of struts, but they don't seem to be helping much. How do I fix this?

I've also tried 4 SRB's with like 5 struts on each side + 5 struts to main rocket at the top, then same at the middle and the bottom. They're still extremely wobbly and ruining my rocket almost right away.

Edited March 6, 2019 by Actually_New_KSP_Player
